              your
               
              best
               
              coat
              ,
               
              Master
              
              Ford
              .
               
              This
               
              ’tis
               
              to
               
              be
               
              married
              ;
               
              this
               
              ’tis
               
              to
               
              have
               
              linen
              
              and
               
              buck-baskets
              !
               
              Well
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              proclaim
               
              myself
              
              what
               
              I
               
              am
              .
               
              I
               
              will
               
              now
               
              take
               
              the
               
              lecher
              .
               
              He
               
              is
               
              at
               
              my
              
              house
              .
               
              He
               
              cannot
               
              ’scape
               
              me
              .
               
              ’Tis
               
              impossible
               
              he
              
              should
              .
               
              He
               
              cannot
               
              creep
               
              into
               
              a
               
              half-penny
               
              purse
              ,
              
              nor
               
              into
               
              a
               
              pepper-box
              .
               
              But
               
              lest
               
              the
               
              devil
               
              that
              
              guides
               
              him
               
              should
               
              aid
               
              him
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              search
               
              impossible
              
              places
              .
               
              Though
               
              what
               
              I
               
              am
               
              I
               
              cannot
               
              avoid
              ,
               
              yet
               
              to
              
              be
               
              what
               
              I
               
              would
               
              not
               
              shall
               
              not
               
              make
               
              me
               
              tame
              .
               
              If
               
              I
              
              have
               
              horns
               
              to
               
              make
               
              one
               
              mad
              ,
               
              let
               
              the
               
              proverb
               
              go
              
              with
               
              me
              :
               
              I’ll
               
              be
               
              horn-mad
              .
